description: This file defines a UI Button component using LightningJS framework. It specifies the component's template, state, and input handling for toggling a 'favorited' state.

classes.name: Button
classes.description: A LightningJS component for a button that toggles its state when pressed.

methods.name: input.enter
methods.description: Event handler that toggles the 'isFavorited' state when Enter key is pressed.
